name: Cactoman
description:
Cactoman

Cactoman saves the nature from the greedy humans. Download this game for windows or play directly in the browser. 

SoundFX coming soon!

Controls

Cactoman shoots thorns using mouse when above ground and is able to move when inside the ground

W - Rise from ground and shoot

A - Left

D - Right

S - Go inside ground to move

P.S. This was my first GameJam and I enjoyed it a lot :D
